name: Svartkolla
description:
Svartkolla is a 5 minute game about a sheep lost in the highlands. 

It was made in under 72 hours during the Isolation Game Jam 2019 at Laxahvammur, Iceland by Joon Van Hove & Marín Björt Valtýsdóttir. 

[←] or [A] : Walk left
[→] or [D] : Walk right
[space] : Interact

(I couldn't get fullscreen to work, but you can download a build which runs in fullscreen below)
